name: 3D Platformer - OP Astronaut Adventure 2
description:
This is the 3D Platform project for the assignment. My modifications were:

  1. - Added left dash skill with 1.5 sec cooldown (Q hotkey)
  2. - Added right dash skill with 1.5 sec cooldown (E hotkey)
  3. - Added multi-jump skill with 5 sec cooldown (F hotkey), this allows the player to jump 4 consecutive times within a 5 sec cooldown.
  4. - Added double speed with 2.5 cooldown (SHIFT hotkey).
  5. - Two levels fully designed, you have to use your abilities to pass the levels, otherwise they're impossible.
  6. - Added UI to display the cooldown for all 4 abilities.
